title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Workshops
body: Big River Teacher Workshops       Workshop attendance is required of all teachers unless they have completed the workshop in the past 10 years.The advanced workshop is recommended for experienced BRJ teachers.     Basic Workshop At Fort Snelling State Park Visitor Center (enter park from Post Rd, southwest of airport)   Thursday, February 5, 2015 from 9:00 a.m. - 3:30 p.m. Saturday, February 7, 2015 from 8:30 a.m. - 1:00 p.m.   At the basic workshop teachers will:  participate in demonstrations of supporting classroom activities receive Teacher's Guide of thematic Mississippi River resource materials get oriented to Big River Journey field trip logistics, and introduced to other river related learning opportunities receive Continuing Education certificate      Advanced Workshop The Advanced Workshop is currently under review, look for a revised workshop soon!    Workshop Registration  Call the Mississippi National River and Recreation Area at 651-293-8414 (Brian Goodspeed).  Workshop cost (donation): $20/person or $30/school (nonrefundable) is requested to help defray workshop expenses. Make check payable to "Mississippi National River & Recreation Area"; write "BRJ workshop donation" on the memo line. Send to:   Attn: Brian Goodspeed Mississippi National River & Recreation Area Suite 105 111 E. Kellogg Blvd St. Paul, MN 55101-1256
